name: 19th World Congress on Hepatology
content: On behalf of Hepatology Conference 2022 Organizing Committee, we are pleased to invite Hepatologists, Gastroenterologists, Physicians, Internists, Microbiologists, Pathologists, Virologists, Oncologists, Surgeons, Toxicologists, Researchers, Students, Business delegates and Young researchers across the world to attend 19th World Congress on Hepatology which is to be held on July 28-30 2022 at Rome, Italy. The conference highlights the theme “To discuss the latest updates and cutting-edge technologies in the field of Hepatology”.
